0.0.3.name: wordpress/openitaly4wp
0.0.3.description: Openitaly4WP use XML-RPC interface provided by Openitaly.net to retrieve a list of suggested/popular/random resources by an user or in a configured place of Italy. Administration interface let the admin of a WP blog to configure widget behaviour.
